segments.text: May I ask you a few questions about insurance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now we've given a CIF Shanghai price for some steel plates . What insurance rate do you suggest we should get ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . Obviously , you won ’ t want All Risks cover .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Because they aren ’ t delicate goods and won ’ t likely be damaged on the voyage . FPA will be good enough .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then am I right in understanding that FPA doesn't cover partial loss for the nature of particular average .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . On the other hand , a WA policy covers you against partial loss in all cases .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are there any other clauses in marine policies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , lots of them . For instance , War Risks , TEND and SICC .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , thank you very much for all that information . Could you give me a quotation for my consignment now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you going to make an offer today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . My customer is in urgent need of the steel plates .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , I'll get this rate right away .
segments.speaker: S2
